title: Bug 11863: Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove test cases
description: When using the 'Update Test Suite' action, it is not clear that selecting 'Yes' in the dialog will result in the removal of test case X.
OB: When selecting 'Yes' in the dialog, the test case X should be removed from the test suite.
EB: The 'Update Test Suite' action should provide a clear indication that selecting 'Yes' will remove the specified test case X.
SR: Improve the clarity of the dialog in the 'Update Test Suite' action to clearly communicate that selecting 'Yes' will remove the specified test case X.
